## mercatorTilingScheme variable

The \[\[TilingScheme\]\] used by the HERE web tiles.

The `mercatorTilingScheme` features a quadtree subdivision scheme and a Mercator projection.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
mercatorTilingScheme: TilingScheme
```
